OOC: Airly, you better reply to those shots soon. I don't care if you don't=
 want to lose, I'm sick of your moding!!

IC:

Periwinkle stares and starts=
 crapping. A large pile of crap now sits on the ground. She turns, dropping=
 to her knees. She buries her face in the pile and starts eating away.

McG=
owan: Hear this you shit eaters! Get out here and fight!

Virgo was in a la=
ughing spell, pointing to Periwinkle. The others, too, could not help but l=
augh.

McGowan: And, now! You will come out by the time I count to 10, or B=
rown will be ingested and digested!...1....2....3....4....5.....6.....7....=
..

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Narrator 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogro=
ups.com 
  Sent: Saturday, February 16, 2002 8:03 AM
  Subject: Re: Insecti=
cons. Can you dig it, Chivtrons?...


  Bombshell: Of course!

  He sends a=
 signal to the cerebro shell in Periwinkle's head, it tells her to crap and=
 eat it.

  Bombshell: Nobody has as much fun as me...

    ----- Original =
Message ----- 
    From: *Orchid* 
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent=
: Saturday, February 16, 2002 7:55 AM
    Subject: Re: Insecticons. Can you=
 dig it, Chivtrons?...


    McGowan: Hmm...You got a point there....He is =
shit....Well, think it over and let me know.

    Brown was quite relieved =
that nothing happened yet. McGowan then whispered to him.

    McGowan: Don=
't be so relaxed....Any chivtron in my hands is sure to die....

    Periwi=
nkle dances around like a fool. She does the mambo and also dances like Rik=
ishi Phatu.

    Virgo and the others laugh.

    Virgo: Make her eat her o=
wn crap!...

      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: Narrator 
    =
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
      Sent: Saturday, February 16, 2002 5:11 =
AM
      Subject: Re: Insecticons. Can you dig it, Chivtrons?...


      Ch=
op Shop: (GASP!) Wouldn't that make me a dung beetle? I don't know, it'd be=
 pretty cool, actually.

      Barrage was hit by a shot from the base. He =
totally ignored Apocalypse and aimed a gun at the shields. He was hit by an=
other shot, but then fired 2 missiles at the base. Ransack holds his hand o=
ut and a charge comes out of his wrist. He pressed a button as it lands in =
his hand, and then throws it at the base. It's set to explode when the time=
r ticks down. Venom was hit by 3 shots from the base and gasps.

      Bomb=
shell: Hee hee hee! What should I make her do? Dance!

      He sends out a=
 signal to the shell in Periwinkle's head to make her dance...

        ---=
-- Original Message ----- 
        From: *Orchid* 
        To: nbwrpg@yahoo=
groups.com 
        Sent: Saturday, February 16, 2002 3:51 AM
        Subje=
ct: Re: Insecticons. Can you dig it, Chivtrons?...


        OOC: Damn it! =
Who controls the base? Cause whoever does, reply to my attacks! I'm tired o=
f being ignored! And yet everything seems to go on very casually. Why? Caus=
e I'm not popular like Airly? And Airly, it is McGowan's team! Not Barrymor=
e! And it's Barrymore with an I...

        IC:

        Periwinkle stops s=
truggling and stares into space after the cerebro shell was inserted in her=
 head. She was now Bombshell's slave...

        McGowan swiftly dodges the=
 autoguns shots. Virgo, Birdbot and Papertron are struck by the several sho=
ts but hold their ground. On the other hand, Barrymore, Lee and Depp dodged=
 the shots. Barrymore with a sidejump, Lee with and duck & roll and Depp wi=
th a high jump. She remembered that although Pink was dead, they still had =
Brown.

        McGowan: I hope you Shitrons know that there is going to be=
 another death over here! Your precious little Shitron is about to suffer!
=

        Depp passes Brown to McGowan. McGowan first watches Virgo fire off=
 8 shots, Barrymore fire off 6 shots, Lee fire off 2 fireballs, Depp fire o=
ff 4 plasma shots, Birdbot fire 2 more grenades and Papertron fire off 10 s=
hots. McGowan smiled, watching all of the shots go sailing towards the Chiv=
tron base. McGowan turns to the Insecticons.

        McGowan: Hey, if some=
one doesn't come out soon, would you mind eating this guy?

        Brown e=
yes widened and hoped that the Insecticons would do something less brutal..=
.

          ----- Original Message ----- 
          From: Airshadow Nightl=
ight 
          To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
          Sent: Saturday, Febru=
ary 16, 2002 1:50 AM
          Subject: Re: Insecticons. Can you dig it, Ch=
ivtrons?...


          OOC: Regarding Rudra's ooc's post I'll post with Ae=
rotaur. 

          Windlord/Aerotaur/Nightlight::: 

          "Stop littl=
e one!!" said Aerotaur while he took at Trinity and left her in Nightlight'=
s arms. 

          "But I wanna help, uncle Aerotaur"said Trinity. 

     =
     "No yet"replied Aerotaur  who turned on the base's defences. 

       =
   The external defences turned on and fired against the Insecticons and Ba=
rrimore's team.





------------------------------------------------------=

e of the 2002 Olympic Games

t to the Yahoo! Terms of Service.

        Yahoo! Groups Spon=
sor

Terms of Service.
